name: Heaven or Hell (TeamRookieCookie)
description:
Heaven or Hell

A little puzzle game were it is your mission to decide were the soul of the deceased are receding. Heaven or Hell ?

This game was made for the mini jam 69

Game was made by Raffael Schäfer

Soundclips from https://www.leshylabs.com/apps/sfMaker/

Music:

Bleeping Demo by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7012-bleeping-demo
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
